price: (19) So there came upon it [i.e., the garden] an affliction from your Lord while they were asleep.
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
